response.overview: a 1999 Japanese short original video animation made as a promotion for the release of Custom Robo for the Nintendo 64. It was distributed on VHS exclusively in Japan as a mail order gift given to readers of Shogakukan's manga magazine, CoroCoro Comic. The film features a boy named Kouji becoming the Commander of Ray and defeating a group of thieves in a Robo Battle.
response.title: Custom Robo: The Animation
